casebody.data:
No. 10-5221. Teresa Zerilli-Edelglass, Petitioner v. New York City Transit, et al. 562 U.S. 824, 131 S. Ct. 385,

178 L. Ed. 2d 19,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6235. October 4, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis *20denied. Petitioner is allowed until October 25, 2010, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.

Same case below, 353 Fed. Appx. 621.
